Html: Unfortunately, I'm having an issue when trying to scroll a ChartPlotter (or any charts included in the samples).  When I position my mouse on the control and scroll, all the lines disappear and everything is frozen (ie I cannot pan or anything) until I right click and click Fit To View.  Does anyone know how to fix this issue?  I tried handling the mousewheel event, but this will not remove the current attached delegate that is causing the trouble.  Is there a way to find out the delegate to manually remove it, so I can add my own delegate in.
